name: Fate of Ur
description:
A Fantasy RPG game.

An evil wizard has plagued the land of Ur and you must defeat him. Kill enemies to receive upgrades and explore to find items.

z-interact (no caps lock)

Shift-inventory

Assets Used

GB Studio Sample project

16x16 Black Cultist Character Spritesheet by KDYA -https://kdya.itch.io/16x16-black-cultist

EVil Wizard 2 by LuizMelo - https://luizmelo.itch.io/evil-wizard-2?download

Monsters Creatures Fantasy by LuizMelo - https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy

Matriax-free-assets by Davit Masia - https://kronbits.itch.io/matriax-free-assets

Fantasy Pixel Art Asset Pack by teamgriffin - https://teamgriffin.itch.io/molly-asset-pack

Flying Obelisk by CreativeKind - https://creativekind.itch.io/flying-obelisk
